title: Command line Solr check softwares
description: I'm in need of a command tool Nagios and the like can execute that verifies a Solr server is working... Basically it'll be a jar with apps that return error codes if a given criteria isn't met.

comments.author: Jason Rutherglen
comments.content:
No-commit

Here's a couple apps that:

1) Check the query time
2) Check the last replication time

They exit with error code 1 on failure, 0 on success
